attributes.comment:
Please reconsider the dramatic increase in adoption fees that are being proposed
under docket number USCIS-2006-0044-0001. Adoption is an extremely expensive
endevour. Those of us who persue it could use all the help we can get from our
own government. Given that the time limit before expiration is not changing,
many adoptive parents will have to pay fees twice in order to keep a current
I171H form and fingerprints on file. We are simply asking that the already high
fees be kept at a reasonable level in order for adoption to remain a viable
option to anyone who desires to persue it.
Sincerely, Beri Jenkins
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Beri Jenkins
